Control Name: 4.4.9 Network connectivity redundancy for on premise data/application sources.
Control Statement: For cross-premises connectivity (ExpressRoute or VPN) are there redundant connections from different locations? i.e. at least two connections from two different locations

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 4.4 How are you handling disaster recovery for this workload?
